LanguageData.ErrorCouldNotGetTraitToRemove: Could not get trait to remove
LanguageData.SettingMovementSpeedBoostDurationSeconds: Movement Speed Bonus Duration Cap (in seconds)
LanguageData.SettingAttackSpeedBoostDurationSecondsCa: Attack Speed Bonus Duration Cap (in seconds)
LanguageData.IconianSentryExplodeDesc: Order the sentry to self-explode, causing an explosion proportional to the time left
LanguageData.IconianSentryTeleportDesc: Order the sentry to teleport to a target location in range, consuming half an hour of lifespan
LanguageData.IconianSelectCasterDesc: Select the caster that summoned this turret
LanguageData.IconianBreakLinkBuildingDesc: Break the connection to this sentry, ejecting it from this reality
